DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to examine the effects of Parent Management Training Oregon (PMTO) compared to treatment as usual (TAU) for parents with children aged 3 and 12 showing behavioral problems.
DOC.detailed_description: This project estimates the causal effect of Parent Management Training, Oregon (PMTO) in a Danish context. The study design is an RCT where PMTO is compared to Treatment As Usual (TAU). The target population is parents with children aged 3 and 12 showing behavioral problems. The primary outcome estimates changes in child behavior, and is measured three times: baseline, seven months follow-up, and 19 month follow-up.
DOC.criteria: Families with children that are eligible for PMTO and at least one other type of family training program The family does not want to participate
